original_title: Inner Sanctum: Live from the Royal Opera House, 2018
overview: The iconic duo's acclaimed production, first presented at the Royal Opera House in 2016 over four sold-out shows, was reprised at the venue for a further four nights in July 2018 as part of their 'Super' tour. Staged by long-term PSB designer Es Devlin and choreographer/director Lynne Page, the show was filmed by director David Barnard.
title: Inner Sanctum: Live from the Royal Opera House, 2018
